summary:
More than 25 years of engineering experience in the areas of oil and gas, petrochemical and chemical industries, covering all project phases from (pre)FEED to Detailed Engineering and Construction for projects in Russia, Asia, Australia, India, The Middle East, Africa, Europe and the USA for both onshore and off-shore projects.

Senior Principle Piping Lead Engineer at McDermott / CB&I, and Piping Design Engineer at Jacobs Engineering, and ABB Lummus Global.

Broad experience: 

-	Working with Russian projects / clients and Russian Design Institutes.
-	Multi-Office Project Execution (MOPEX) and working as part of a consortium.
-	Working in integrated “Contractor & Client” teams.
-	Off-Shore Projects, FLNG, FPSO, Fixed Platforms, Production Platforms, Riser Platforms.
-	Developing, implementing and integrating the AVEVA 3D engineering suite as an integrated
engineering tool for engineering, procurement, construction, commissioning and start-up.

As Senior Principle Piping Engineer, I have gained extensive experience in technical reviews, peer reviews, trouble shooting on corporate level.
